greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The next smallest pair of numbers is taken so that a(2n-1)/a(2n) converges to Pi.
comment: "Next smallest" means that a(2n-1)+a(2n) is the smallest value that is greater than the previous pair.
link: P. D. Howard, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..37733
results.author: _Bodo Zinser_, Nov 22 2001
